name: ChargePoint
0:
”Alexa, ask ChargePoint to start charging my car.”
”Alexa, ask ChargePoint if my car is plugged in.”
”Alexa, ask ChargePoint how many miles I added in my last charging session.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: chargepoint
des:
Charging your EV at home is incredibly easy with Alexa and ChargePoint Home. Just tell Alexa to start charging your car, check your charging status or tell you your charging history. Alexa can even let you know if your car is plugged in so you never have to go out to the garage and check.

With Alexa and ChargePoint, you can:

Start and stop charging your car
Stop charging your car
Ask if your car is plugged in 
Check charging status 
Check miles added
See how much you spent on charging
Check your ChargePoint account balance

Requires a ChargePoint Home charger connected to WiFi and Alexa to charge your car. You can only connect one ChargePoint account to Alexa.

If you don't already have it, get the ChargePoint app to find stations near you: chargepoint.com/mobile
